_header: Jesu rested in a may / Forty weeks and a day
_description: A Christmas carol — three quatrains (aaab) with ‘Nowell ell ell’ refrain and burden: ‘Nowell nowell ell ell / Iwys yt ys a wunder nowell’

CamStJohn259.First Lines: Ihesu restyd in a mayxl wekis and a day…
CamStJohn259.Last Lines: …hosyll and schirft at oure endyngeNowell ell ell
CamStJohn259.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes,  and  G. C. Macaulay, eds.  
             “Fifteenth Century Carols and Other Pieces.” 
             Modern Language Review
         8 (1913): 68-87: 69-70.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 57; 1977, 47.
